TLC_ShowRf Property

CDXML Name:ShowRf
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_TLC_ShowRf
CDX Constant Value:0x0AB2
Data Size:CDXBoolean
Property of objects:kCDXObj_TLCSpot
First written/read in:ChemDraw 8.0
Required?No

Description:

Show the spot's Retention Fraction (Rf) value if non-zero..

If this property is absent:

The Rf value of the spot will not be shown.
